net.sf.beezle.mork.semantics

Class AttributionBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.beezle.mork.semantics.AttributionBuffer

  • public class AttributionBuffer
extends Object
    Attribution function call buffer. Having the buffer simplifies creation and optimization of AGs because things are not hard-wired and I don't need a context to create an AttributionBuffer instance.
